title: "Small-batch EVs and plenty of robots—Hyundai’s new innovation center"
excerpt: "Hyundai's Innovation Center has put robots in charge of that entire task. One robot places the dash while another swings in and secures it to the vehicle. An impressive feat, because this task is full of constantly changing variables."
